scripts.uglify-js: for file in `basename -a static/js/*.js`   ; do uglifyjs static/js/${file}  -o static/ugly/js/${file}  ; done
scripts.clean-css: for file in `basename -a static/css/*.css` ; do cleancss static/css/${file} -o static/clean/css/${file} ; done
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run uglify-js && npm run clean-css && npm run hashmark-js && npm run hashmark-css && npm run move
scripts.hugo: npm run build && hugo && hugo serve
